sentences.en: Aromatic capsules are great for easing the discomfort of a stuffy nose.
sentences.cn: 芳香胶囊对缓解鼻塞有奇效。

sentences.en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
sentences.cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

sentences.en: He had had a fight with Smith and bloodied his nose.
sentences.cn: 他和史密斯打了一架，把后者的鼻子打出了血。

sentences.en: He has a broken nose but may be discharged today.
sentences.cn: 他鼻梁断了，但或许今天就能出院。

sentences.en: He was thin and tall, with a hooked nose.
sentences.cn: 他又瘦又高，长着鹰钩鼻。

sentences.en: I didn't mean to break his nose. I just saw red.
sentences.cn: 我不是故意要打断他的鼻梁。我只是一时气急。

sentences.en: If you kept your nose clean, you had a job for life.
sentences.cn: 如果你规规矩矩，就可以一辈子都捧着这个饭碗。

sentences.en: In heavy concentrations, ozone is irritating to the eyes, nose and throat.
sentences.cn: 高浓度的臭氧会对眼睛、鼻子和咽喉有刺激作用。

sentences.en: Okay so have an affair, but not right under my nose.
sentences.cn: 有外遇就有外遇好了，但别在我眼皮底下。

sentences.en: She even had plastic surgery to change the shape of her nose.
sentences.cn: 为改变鼻子的形状，她甚至接受了整形手术。

sentences.en: She wrinkled her nose, piqued by his total lack of enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 她皱皱鼻子，为他毫无热情而感到不快。

sentences.en: Someone punched him on the nose.
sentences.cn: 有人一拳打在他的鼻子上。

sentences.en: They went over to the aeroplane and stood near its nose.
sentences.cn: 他们朝飞机走了过去并站在靠近机头的地方。

sentences.en: Timothy was crying, mostly from exhaustion, and his nose was running.
sentences.cn: 由于太累了，蒂莫西哭的一把鼻涕一把泪。

sentences.en: We don'tlike paying through the nose for our wine when eating out.
sentences.cn: 下馆子时，我们不喜欢在酒水上花很多钱。

sentences.en: When someone has hayfever, the eyes and nose will stream and itch.
sentences.cn: 花粉热临床表现为流泪、流涕，眼睛、鼻子发痒。

sentences.en: Why did you have to stick your nose in?

words.tran_cn: 大鼻子的；爱追问的（等于nosy）
好管闲事的；爱追问的；大鼻子的

phrases.tran_cn: （尤指为确定表决时的票数而）数人数

phrases.phrase: cut off one's nose to spite one's face
have one's nose in a book

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)不卷入是非；远离麻烦；洁身自好

phrases.phrase: keep one's nose to the grindstone

phrases.tran_cn: 突鼻组件；喷嘴；换镜旋座；测头管壳
（尤指交通繁忙时车辆）一辆紧接一辆，首尾相连

phrases.phrase: not see further than one's (或 the end of one's) no
phrases.tran_cn: 无远见；估计不到可能出现的情况（或可能产生的后果）

phrases.phrase: put someone's nose out of joint
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)使某人不安；惹恼某人

trans.tran_cn: 鼻子，嗅觉，芳香，香气，突出的部分
trans.tran_en: the part of a person’s or animal’s face used for smelling or breathing
the part of a person’s or animal’s face used for smelling or breathing

trans.tran_cn: 嗅出，闻出，用鼻子触，用鼻子品评（酒）等，探出
